title: cyberthreat data
extract: Ransomware: A type of malware that encrypts a user's or organization's data and demands a ransom — often in the form of cryptocurrency — for the data to be decrypted.May 22, 2018
extract_html: Ransomware: A type of malware that encrypts a user's or organization's data and demands a ransom — often in the form of cryptocurrency — for the data to be decrypted.May 22, 2018
